Renderer.1 {
    BackgroundColor = white;
    BorderColor = black;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Renderer.2 {
    BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
    BorderColor = black;
    Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
    FillColor = #006EFF;
    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
    TextColorFilled = white;
    TextureBackground = None;
    TextureFill = None;
}

Renderer.3 {
    BackgroundColor = transparent;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    Borders = (0, 0, 0, 0);
    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
    TextureBackground = None;
}

Renderer.4 {
}

Renderer.5 {
    BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
    BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
    BackgroundColorHover = white;
    BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
    BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
    BorderColorHover = black;
    Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
    CaretColor = black;
    CaretWidth = 1;
    DefaultTextColor = #A0A0A0;
    Padding = (0, 0, 0, 0);
    SelectedTextBackgroundColor = #006EFF;
    SelectedTextColor = white;
    TextColor = #3C3C3C;
    TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
    Texture = None;
    TextureDisabled = None;
    TextureFocused = None;
    TextureHover = None;
}

Renderer.6 {
    Texture = "../textures/modules/NONE.png" Smooth;
    TransparentTexture = false;
}

Group.Build {
    Position = (5%, 5%);
    Renderer = &4;
    Size = (60%, 40%);

    Picture.CurrentHull {
        Position = (0, 5%);
        Renderer = &6;
        Size = (96, 96);
    }

    Picture.CurrentGun {
        Position = (96 + 2%, 5%);
        Renderer = &6;
        Size = (96, 96);
    }

    Picture.CurrentLeftModule {
        Position = (192 + 4%, 5%);
        Renderer = &6;
        Size = (96, 96);
    }

    Picture.CurrentRightModule {
        Position = (288 + 6%, 5%);
        Renderer = &6;
        Size = (96, 96);
    }
}

ScrollablePanel.Variants {
    ContentSize = (480, 0);
    Position = (5%, 45%);
    Renderer = &1;
    Size = (60%, 50%);
    Visible = false;
}

Group.MultiplayerSettings {
    Position = (65%, 5%);
    Renderer = &4;
    Size = (30%, 40%);

    Label.Label1 {
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (30%, 18);
        Text = "Server IP:";
        TextSize = 13;
        VerticalAlignment = Center;
    }

    Label.Label2 {
        Position = (0, 25);
        Renderer = &3;
        Size = (30%, 18);
        Text = "Name:";
        TextSize = 13;
        VerticalAlignment = Center;
    }

    EditBox.ServerIP {
        Position = (30%, 0);
        Renderer = &5;
        Size = (70%, 22);
        Text = localhost;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    EditBox.Name {
        Position = (30%, 25);
        Renderer = &5;
        Size = (70%, 22);
        Text = Name;
        TextSize = 13;
    }

    Button.Play {
        Position = (0, 70);
        Text = Play;
        TextSize = 13;

        Renderer {
            BackgroundColor = #F5F5F5;
            BackgroundColorDisabled = #E6E6E6;
            BackgroundColorDown = #EBEBEB;
            BackgroundColorHover = white;
            BorderColor = #3C3C3C;
            BorderColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
            BorderColorDown = black;
            BorderColorFocused = #1E1EB4;
            BorderColorHover = black;
            Borders = (1, 1, 1, 1);
            TextColor = #3C3C3C;
            TextColorDisabled = #7D7D7D;
            TextColorDown = black;
            TextColorHover = black;
            Texture = None;
            TextureDisabled = None;
            TextureDown = None;
            TextureDownFocused = None;
            TextureDownHover = None;
            TextureFocused = None;
            TextureHover = None;
        }
    }
}

Group.InfoGroup {
    Position = (65%, 45%);
    Renderer = &4;
    Size = (30%, 50%);

    ScrollablePanel.ModuleInfo {
        ContentSize = (0, 1000);
        Renderer = &1;
        Size = (100%, 100%);
        Visible = false;

        Picture.ModulePreview {
            Position = (0, 5%);
            Size = (96, 96);

            Renderer {
                Texture = "../textures/modules/NONE.png" Smooth;
                TransparentTexture = false;
            }
        }

        Label.ModuleName {
            HorizontalAlignment = Center;
            Position = (96 + 5%, 30);
            Renderer = &3;
            Size = (90% - 96, 18);
            Text = None;
            TextSize = 13;
        }

        Group.RechargeTimeGroup {
            Position = (0, 96 + 7%);
            Renderer = &4;
            Size = (100%, 20);

            ProgressBar."Recharge time" {
                Maximum = 150;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (20%, 0);
                Renderer = &2;
                Size = (75%, 20);
                TextSize = 13;
                Value = 60;
            }

            Label.Label19 {
                Renderer = &3;
                Size = (17%, 18);
                Text = "Recharge time";
                TextSize = 13;
            }
        }

        Group.StaminaCostGroup {
            Position = (0, 116 + 8%);
            Renderer = &4;
            Size = (100%, 20);

            ProgressBar."Stamina cost" {
                Maximum = 30;
                Minimum = 0;
                Position = (20%, 0);

                Value = 7;

                Maximum = 55;
                Minimum = 0;

                TextSize = 13;
